text: Jean Jourden (11 July 1942 â€“ 23 November 2024) was a French cyclist. He won the road race at the 1961 UCI Road World Championships. He won some minor races and rode the Tour de France in 1968 and 1969. Jourden was born Saint- Brieuc, France. Jourden died on 23 November 2024, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2024 deaths Category:French cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Brittany
title: Jean Jourden
